lexUnit.name: reiterate.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: say something again or repeatedly.

sentence.text: But Mr Akers reiterated yesterday that he saw no long-term change in economic assumptions or any downturn in demand for the company 's products .
` These sort of propensities , " he reiterated more confidently .

Can I , at this point , reiterate how important it is to have this type of insurance cover if you are taking private classes .

The decline in England 's lineout fortunes , one would reiterate , owes most to the fact that , thanks to the mandatory gap , it is now so much easier to get in a jump against them .

The practice reiterated its concern about having the freedom to refer patients according to clinical need .
